title: Dems Bemoan Lack of Action on Guns by GOP
description:
(4 Oct 2017) Congressman John Lewis (D-Ga.) joined fellow Democratic representatives on the steps of the U.S. Capitol building on Wednesday to call for action on gun legislation in the wake of the deadly mass shooting in Las Vegas that killed 59 people. 
He indicated Republicans were not focusing on the issue at hand.
"Don't tell me this is about anything other than greed, money and fear," Rep. Lewis said.


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/56fc09a2a8fb445f6e11f7631163906f
